page.title: 15HOSPITAL PROVISION
page.content: There has been a great deal of damage due to vandalism at Erith Cottage Hospital. Outside the X-Ray room there is a lot of graffiti which has not been removed as one of the staff said that it would cost over Â£500, and they could put that amount of money to better use. There are no children staying at the hospital, they only go there for stitches, broken arms, blood tests etc. If there is an emergency they are sent to West Hill Hospital at Dartford. Ambulances don't normally go to Erith Hospital except to take patients to bigger and better equipped hospitals.
